title: Kotica
content:
A futuristic face with working title "Kotica"   
I was deep into the face when I lost a hard drive-so remember to back up boys and girls, ![kotica.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417071643im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/791.jpg)
author: designalchemy

comments.content:
This seems to lack the depth or the character of   
your "Syncratica." Perhaps it's the mono   
widths... or the seemingly forced 'curves' in the   
J or the various Bs, etc.   
   
But, I can't really put my finger on it.

Regarding all the various "B"s, (reading acorss, left to right, starting in the top row) I prefer the 3rd, 4th and 7th "B"s best. They seem to have the best balance of legibility and innovation, and seem to harmonize best with the other glyphs.   
   
I prefer the 1st "D" and the 2nd "M", too.   
   
David
